title: Encrypted database
description: Export or import the encrypted workspace database. Keep the password in a safe place.

export.title: Export encrypted database
export.subtitle: Choose a strong password and store the encrypted file securely.

import.title: Import encrypted database
import.subtitle: Provide the password for an existing encrypted backup. You will be asked to restart after a successful import.
import.success: Database imported successfully. Use the dialog to close and restart the application.

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least {{length}} characters long

restartModal.title: Restart required
restartModal.description: The encrypted database has been imported. Close the application to apply the changes.

description.export: We are preparing the encrypted archive. Please keep the application open.
description.import: We are restoring the encrypted archive. Please keep the application open.
